list or sum

list or sum is a command that lists all the numbers in a list or sums them up.

  • list
  • sum

What is KirkBot?

KirkBot is a Discord bot that is currently in development. It is a bot that is designed to be a multipurpose bot, with a focus on moderation and fun commands. It is currently in development, and is not yet ready for use.

What is the Documentation Project?

The Documentation Project is a project that is designed to document the commands of KirkBot. It is currently in development, and is not yet ready for use.

How can I help?

You can help by contributing to the Documentation Project. You can contribute by editing the documentation, or by adding new commands to the documentation. You can also help by contributing to the bot itself. You can contribute to the bot by adding new commands, or by fixing bugs. You can also help by reporting bugs, or by suggesting new features.

How can I contribute?

You can contribute by editing the documentation, or by adding new commands to the documentation. You can also contribute by adding new commands to the bot, or by fixing bugs. You can also contribute by reporting bugs, or by suggesting new features.

How can I report bugs?

You can report bugs by creating an issue on the GitHub repository. You can also report bugs by joining the support server, and reporting the bug in the #bug-reports channel.

How can I suggest new features?

You can suggest new features by creating an issue on the GitHub repository. You can also suggest new features by joining the support server, and suggesting the feature in the #suggestions channel.

You can contribute to the bot by adding new commands, or by fixing bugs. You can also contribute by reporting bugs, or by suggesting new features.
